@wizzyrea It's seeming like, to get realtime wind data, you'd need your own weather station. Or befriend someone who has one.
@wizzyrea UK's "WOW" program has some more fine-grained Wgtn stations. No output API though. Maybe screenscrape? https://t.co/NkbTd2zDuX
@wizzyrea The API for aviation weather gives you the half-hourly data for Wgtn airport. Not realtime, tho... https://t.co/v0KxRheKrj
The fact that you follow Kai Ryssdal on Twitter, is soooo very @DylanShaver. ;)

@seawall Our baby is a bottomless milk pit.
In the US, networks have letter names (eg NBC), and local affiliates have their own call sign, channel number (eg KVVU FOX 5 in Las Vegas)
Fun fact: In NZ, pre-digital TV's wd let you assign the "number" for the channel at each freq, cuz NZ TV networks have number names (eg TV1)
Finally ordered a flatscreen TV to replace my aged 30in "sea anchor". Main impetus was the increasing scarcity of nâ€¦ https://t.co/1O6MPlRnFE
So I figured it'd do the trick for the PB ice cream, which freezes into a brick. And it did! A little maple aftertaste, but it combines well
I made maple ice cream last week, noticed it froze much softer than other recipes, and that the maple flavor was fairly subtle.
Solved the problem w my peanut butter ice cream recipe's over-firm texture. Solution: replace sugar w maple syrup (real or fake).

When did he have time to go shopping? https://t.co/9q0Y95VYvf
@TVsAndyDaly So has Don DiMello accepted a position in the administration yet? ;)
@samjarman When you put on the sorting hat it helps you tell which Hogwarts house you should join.
This cord remnant's starting to look like the Sorting Hat from Harry Potter https://t.co/Sy7KwHNU3s
That's a pretty big daddy longlegs! My hand for scale. https://t.co/brgmDitrVn
Day 13. He's gotten so pudgy in the past few days! :) https://t.co/kZERdbyCLU
@wizzyrea My fave hidden gem lately, is "Void Pyramid". Author's other Android game is great too. https://t.co/HLxEyXusHx
@wizzyrea Currently installed, I've got "Climb!" and the FOSS "Simon Tatham's Puzzles", which is versatile but a bit flavorless
@wizzyrea I've played so many! Mostly Google store's "most popular" are play-to-win, so it takes some digging to find the good games.
@PeopleofNZ Mine's 13 days old. It's actually been pretty fun so far. :) Lack of sleep is the main annoyance. https://t.co/2QSF3K8XVE
@TetZoo Prophetic dream ;)
@pepperraccoon Guilty as charged ;) https://t.co/i7R1tP0Iat
"Express Yourself" is about using a breast pump, right?
@JennyKayNZ @seawall Tho actually, Flip's namesake, my grandpa, was himself 6'1". Lots of tall in my mom's family too, just not mom herself.
@JennyKayNZ @seawall Indeed, the chart itself says only 80% accuracy, +/- 6 cm. & squirmy babies hard to measure accurately.
Based on his birth size, statistically Flip will reach my height around age 13, will end up about 6'. Takes after @seawall if so!
@anzeljg Too late on the "no sleepless nights" part, but the love part is working out good. ;)
"Check out these guns!" https://t.co/a0Zaf5I5Wx
@DrCuriosity I just have a lot of feelings. ;) https://t.co/uHEz8Glw23
@DrCuriosity I also just listened to "Beautiful Boy", "Cat's in the Cradle", and "Little Kawai", so I think I may be cried out now. ðŸ˜‚
Cheesiest new parent moment so far: crying to Creed's "Arms Wide Open".

Our little Kiwi https://t.co/avs4XR3VrJ
@seawall @Skyliting Yep, he doesn't like being naked. Calms right down once he's dressed and picked up.
@annemjw This is how he cries most times we change his nappy or clothes. The good news is he soothes instantly when he's picked up after. :)

If you hate something, set it free. If it doesn't come back to you, good.
Baby on my belly. https://t.co/Y8ataYLzFF
Says what it is. #BABY @ Wellington Hospital, New Zealand https://t.co/sCrAHIwSwl
@DylanShaver My donor-daughter w @bemiljen has a mild hearing impairment, so seems I've got a recessive gene for it. But aprly not @seawall.
@grumpybirb And his girl name is Lilian Adel Wells, if he adopts a female identity. Because being trans doesn't escape my naming rights. ;)
"Aww, your foot is the size of my thumb. So tiny! Wait, is that poo? How did you get poo on your feet?" #newparent https://t.co/Wd0yIpXiwg
You hear that, Twitter folk? DM @eliasvonhelios if you're interested in being his gestational and/or adoptive partner. ;)
@DylanShaver Anyway, test came out good, no sign of hearing problems. :)
@DylanShaver They're so careful not to pressure you on anything here. I wish I could just tick a general "not afraid of science" box.
@DylanShaver They wanted to leave a pamphlet & come back later to get our decision wr to do the test. I was like, "Can you do it right now?"
@eliasvonhelios It's up for grabs now! Time to have a baby!
More rejected names: Herbert George "H. G." Wells Wells Orson Welles Wells Baby Jessica Stuckin Wells Anhedonia Wells
@normnz Thanks! It was a hand-me-down from one of Angie's friends.
Rejected names: Laser Anubis Wells Artesian Wells Gerund Apostrophe Wells Carl Marks Wells Juan Nguyen Wells William Walter Wells ("Webby")
